title: myCircle's smartDashboard
IntroText1: Welcome to myCircle’s smartDashboard, your cloud-based management centre available on your computer or with the tap of an icon button on your iPad.
IntroText2: Manage your employees, catalogue, pricing and discounts.  View reports and connect social tools to your smartPOS.  Establish user rights for your suite of smartTools.  It’s all here, personalised for your business.
